desc: The world's slimmest & efficient deodorizer, Sopvia V1 Refrigerator Deodorizer minimizes fridge space usage while deodorizing your fridge in just 30mins.

layout.text: The World's Slimmest & Most Efficient Deodorizer
Measuring smaller than a strawberry, the Sopvia V1 Refrigerator Deodorizer minimizes fridge space usage while deodorizing your fridge in just 30mins.
